page.title: 19SCHOOLS INVOLVED IN PROJECT
page.content: Gillibrand CP School was officially opened 12 months after the 3rd Phase was completed. Until Phase 2 existed, children were taught in the annexe of St. George's old school. There are 150 children with a Staff of the Headmaster 5 Full-Time and 1 P.T. Teachers. All Saints C.E. School was built 85 yrs ago. The current Head has been there 10 years. The Christian Festivals are celebrated,and fund raising takes place St.Gregory's R.C.School is built on the site of an 1818 school. The present one opened in 1914 and cost 5000 pounds to build. The school is now split-site,210 pupils and 10 members of Staff. Built in 1914 as an all-age school,Duke Street is now a 2 form entry Junior school, with 230 pupils and 12 Staff. There is a strong tradition of sporting success.
